Notice_59:
1.Release full set of 'Bobby Binancowitz' MOMOs.
2.MOMO evolution adjustments. Every evolution will increase hash power by 1 (Fixed number), users can choose to bind evolution once. Click the ‚Äú?‚Äù on Evolution page, where you can preview the result estimate.
3.Users who have authorized MEC but have not completed the entire evolution will get a full refund.
Notice_61:
1.MOBOX Christmas Lucky Wheel Event! There are four ways to participate in the Lucky wheelÔºöOpen BOX or Chest. Every time a player opens 1 BOX or 1 Chest, you will gain 1 Lucky wheel attempt.
2.Rare and epic MOMO limit will be adjusted. This will only affect newly released MOMOs. Rare MOMOs: Adjusted from 200 to 600. Epic MOMOs: Adjusted from 50 to 150.
3.The Initial Hash Power of MOMOs will be adjusted on monthly basis (for newly minted MOMOs). This will only affect newly released rare and epic MOMOs. Hash Power of MOMOs adjusted range can be viewed in ‚ÄúMy MOMO‚Äù- ‚ÄúCollection‚Äù.
4. MDX BOX lottery event and BANANA mining event will be removed.
5.Added 20 sets of MOMOs.
Notice_63: 1. Added 16 EPIC MOMO‚Äôs to the platform.
Notice_65:
1. The market adds block trading. You can directly sell or purchase 3-10 BRC721MOMOs or 3-10 sets of MOMOs with different MOMO crew.
2. Optimize platform user interface.
Notice_67:
1.MOBOX anniversary event. During the event, players can earn MOMO points by completing daily tasks. MOMO points can redeem for MOBOX anniversary Boxes!
2. Hash power bonus(%) adjustment.https://www.mobox.io/community/article/622b37f63aab5f8ab8038501
3. Starting on April 6th, original MOMO farmer pool will be will have its distribution halved from 200,000 MBOX to 100,000 MBOX.
4. The gem lottery will be closed after April 12th. Gems will be released through events in the future.
Notice_69: 1.The number of supply of Mystery BOX in Normal Raffle has been adjusted from 2000 to 500.1,500 MOMOs (same quality as the Mystery BOX opening probability) will be placed in the MOMOverse each week and will require a MOBall to be consumed to BOX(ing).
Notice_71:
1. Add 19 MOMO families with Common, Uncommon, Unique and Rare.
2. Add 16 Epic MOMOs.
3. The MOMO Collection Book is updated and new types of filters are added.
4. Fixed some known bugs.
Notice_73:
1. BEP-1155 Bulk Purchase
The Marketplace launches bulk purchase for Mystery BOX, MEC BOX, MEC, and GEM.
Notice_75:
1.MEC BOX Super Raffle: The total number of veMBOX Lottery and Hash power Lottery has been increased to 4 times the original lottery amount; the number of individual lotteries available has also been increased to 4 times the original amount.
2. Adjustment to the consumption of MEC required for MOMO enhancement.
2.1 The MEC required to enhance a Rare MOMO for 1 up enhancement = (current initial hash power - 8), up to 200MEC.
2.2 The MEC required to enhance an Epic MOMO for 1 up enhancement = (current initial hash power - 25)*2, up to 500 MEC.
2.3 The MEC required to enhance a Legendary MOMO for 1 up enhancement = (Current Initial Power-20)*3, up to 1000 MEC.
Notice_77: 1.  BOX Super Raffle: The total number of BOX super raffles will be reduced from 18,000 to 15,000. The veMBOX requirements for the super raffle remain unchanged.
Notice_79:
1. MOMO Upgrade Requirements: Removed rare MOMO and epic MOMO requirements during the MOMO upgrade. The adjusted upgrade cost will be greatly reduced. Epic MOMO and Legendary MOMO need to consume MEC whenever upgrading from level 19. After the update, you can check the specific requirements of MEC in 'Upgrade Preview‚Äù.
2. Fixed a bug in the display of the lower limit of the Hash Power range.
3. From 9th September 2022, the proportion of MBOX burning for MOBOX Games will be adjusted, 2/3 of MBOX will continue to be regularly burned, and 1/3 will be distributed into the MOMO Farm Buyback Pool, which will be used to build and expand the economics of the MOBOX platform.
Notice_81:
Which supports a quick exchange between MBOX and MEC. Liquidity will be provided by the players. Details of Fees
1. 5% transaction fee is charged on each trade.
2. 60% of the fee is allocated to the liquidity provider in the MBOX - MEC LP.
3. 40% of the fee is allocated to the MBOX Buyback pool.
Notice_83:
1. MOMO Hash Power Range Adjustment.
2. MOMO Percent Bonus Rules Adjustment.
More Details: https://www.mobox.io/community/article/62fd9a8f3aab5f8ab8dafff2
Air-drop_254: Set your talent, Collect the suits, defeat the dungeon boss to win the daily MOMO sweep reward.
Air-drop_275: Based on last 7 days' performance. Does not account for impermanent loss.
Air-drop_276: By adding liquidity you'll earn 3% of all trades on the MBOX - MEC pair proportional to your share of the pool. Fees are added to the pool, accrue in real time and can be claimed by withdrawing your liquidity.

Gemstone_38: Unstake MOMO is not available during the MEC BOX subscription period
MOMO_36:
1. When upgrading rare MOMOs to level that are exactly 5X(Ex: L5, L10, L15, L20), it must consume the same series of MOMOs.
2. When upgrading epic MOMOs to level that are exactly 5X(Ex: L5, L10, L15, L20), it must consume the same series of MOMOs (Quality ‚â§ Rare).
MOMO_81:
1„ÄÅRare MOMOs: For the first two months, Initial Hash Power limit will be increased by 20. From the third month on, Initial Hash Power limit will be increased by 10. When the upper limit of Initial Hash Power = the upper limit of MEC enhancement hash power, the Initial Hash Power of MOMOs and the upper limit of MEC enhancement hash power will be adjusted simultaneously.
2„ÄÅEpic MOMOs: For the first month, Initial Hash Power limit will be increased by 30. From the second month on, Initial Hash Power limit will be increased by 20. When the upper limit of Initial Hash Power = the upper limit of MEC enhancement hash power, the Initial Hash Power of MOMOs and the upper limit of MEC enhancement hash power will be adjusted simultaneously.
3„ÄÅLegendary MOMOs: Newly released legendary MOMO Initial Hash Power is always equal the upper limit of epic MOMO MEC enhancement hash power +30. The upper limit of all legendary MOMO MEC enhancement hash power is always equal to the upper limit of epic MOMO MEC enhancement hash power +30.
Please note: This adjustment will only affect newly released MOMOs.¬†
MOMO_82: Please enter the hash power of the corresponding range
MOMO_87:
1. Only 1 option can be selected for MOMO transfer at a time.¬†The crew transfers only need select one MOMO, and the entire crew will be selected at the same time.¬†
2.BRC721 token transfer can choose 1-10 MOMOs to transfer together. Crew transfer can choose 1-10 different MOMO crews to transfer together.
MOMO_89: Productivity = (MOMO initial hash power x 20 + current hash power) x (1 +  bonus of gems)
MOMO_90: MAX transfer limit has been reached
MOMO_97:
1. The MEC required to enhance a Rare MOMO for 1 up enhancement = (current initial hash power - 8), up to 200MEC.
2. The MEC required to enhance an Epic MOMO for 1 up enhancement = (current initial hash power - 25)*2, up to 500 MEC.
3. The MEC required to enhance a Legendary MOMO for 1 up enhancement = (Current Initial Power-20)*3, up to 1000 MEC.
MOMO_98: This MOMO has not reached the [Standard Initial Hash Power] #0# and does not count towards the percentage bonus; you need to increase the MOMO's [Initial Hash Power] through Enhancement to gain the percentage bonus.
MOMO_99: The total percentage bonus of all MOMO which reached the [Standard Initial Hash Power].
MOMO_100: This BRC721 MOMO has not reached the [Standard Initial Hash Power] #0# and will lose productivity in the MOMOVerse and cannot be transferred to the MOMOverse.
Fetters_05: When you accumulate a certain amount of Rare, Epic, and Legendary MOMOs that conform with [Initial Hash Power] a Hash Power Bonus (%) will be activated.
Market_71: If some of the items have been purchased, continue to purchase the remaining items.
Market_83:
1. Only 1 option can be selected for MOMO sale at a time.¬†The crew sales only need select one MOMO, and the entire crew will be selected at the same time.¬†
2.BRC721 token sale can choose 3-10 MOMOs to sell together. Crew sale can choose 3-10 different MOMO crews to sell together.
Market_85: MAX sale limit has been reached.
Market_88: Please enter the selling price again to confirm
Market_94: You have selected MOMOs of the same crew
Market_95: Quantity for sell range from 3 to 10
Market_97: Input price does not match total price
Market_99: Own' means that you have activated the MOMO crew  hash bonus
Market_100: You have selected MOMOs of the same crew
Market_102: This MOMO does not reach the [Standard Initial Hash Power] #0# , confirm to purchase for #1#?
Market_103: This purchase has MOMO that does not reach the [Standard Initial Hash Power] #0# , confirm to purchase for #1#?
Market_104: This purchase has MOMO that does not reach the [Standard Initial Hash Power] , confirm to purchase for #0#?
Festival_41:
1.The Christmas event will last for 14 days, there are four ways to participate in the Lucky wheel:
1)Open BOX or Chest. Every time a player opens 1 BOX or 1 Chest, you will gain 1 Lucky wheel attempt.
2)Upgrade MOMOs. For every MOMO consumed used for upgrading, there is a 50% chance to gain 1 Lucky wheel attempt.
3)MOMO enhancement. When enhancing MOMOs, the probability of gaining 1 Lucky wheel attempt = # of MEC consumed/400.
4)NFT marketplace. All trades in the market (MOMO, BOX, MEC BOX, MEC, GEM, MOMO LENDING), the probability of gaining 1 Lucky wheel attempt = BUSD used/500.
2.Up to 500 Lucky wheel attempts can be gained by each single address during the Christmas Event.
3.There are 10 different rewards available on the Lucky wheel.
IDRewardProbability
1MBOX x115%
2MBOX x35%
3MBOX x201%
4MBOX x2000.1%
5MEC x1550%
6MEC x3023.89%
7MEC x2004%
8MEC x20000.2%
9BOX x10.8%
10Real life Mystery BOX x10.01%

4.A total of 25 Real Mystery BOXes will be given away.¬† Each address can only win 1.¬† The Mystery Boxes contains one MOMO only and are either Rare or Legendary quality.
5.How to claim Real life Mystery BOX.
1)The winner must bind their BNB address with their MOBOX platform account.
2)At the end of the event, a redemption codes will be sent to the winner‚Äôs registered email address.
3)After receiving the redemption code by email, the winner will need to reply and fill in their own shipping information.
4)Your Real-life MOMO Mystery BOX will then be shipped out.
